```{r}
library(dplyr); library(knitr)
f <- list.files("../../Code/NH_COVID/NH_COVID/models/results/S/", full.names = T)

x <- lapply(f, read.csv) %>%
  do.call(rbind,.) 

x %>%
  filter(ResTurn != 0) %>%
  group_by(Type) %>%
  summarise_at(.vars = 'ResTurn', .funs = c('mean', 'median', 'min', 'max')) %>%
  kable(digits = 2)
```


```{r}
f <- list.files("../../Code/NH_COVID/NH_COVID/models/results/LP/", full.names = T)

x <- lapply(f, read.csv) %>%
  do.call(rbind,.) 

x %>%
  filter(latent_period != 0) %>%
  group_by('i') %>%
  summarise_at(.vars = 'latent_period', .funs = c('mean', 'median', 'min', 'max')) 

density(x$latent_period)
```
